title: General Assembly – 1st Session
details: The College of Information Sciences and Computing held its General Assembly to discuss upcoming academic programs, competitions, and initiatives. Attendance and participation contribute to house points for the semester.

title: Bayanihan 2025 – 1st Session
details: In preparation for the upcoming AACCUP Accreditation, the College of Information Sciences and Computing is calling all houses to unite for our Bayanihan Cleanup Drive! Attendance, cleanliness, and completeness of tools are scored for points contributing to overall standings.

title: Valorant Inter-House Tournament
details: The Valorant tournament brought together skilled players from each house in a best-of-three competition format. The event promoted teamwork, communication, and strategic thinking among participants.

title: College Assembly 2025
details: A general assembly highlighting house achievements, leadership announcements, and future plans for the CISC community. Recognition was given to active members and competition winners.
